original_text: And Joash king of Israel sent to Amaziah king of Judah, saying, The thistle that was in Lebanon sent to the cedar that was in Lebanon, saying, Give thy daughter to my son to wife: and there passed by a wild beast that was in Lebanon, and trode down the thistle.
korean_text: 이스라엘 왕 요아스가 유다 왕 아마샤에게 사람을 보내어 이르되 레바논 가시나무가 레바논 백향목에게 전갈을 보내어 이르기를 네 딸을 내 아들에게 주어 아내로 삼게 하라 하였더니 레바논 들짐승이 지나가다가 그 가시나무를 짓밟았느니라

sentences.original_text: And Joash king of Israel sent to Amaziah king of Judah
sentences.korean_translation: 이스라엘 왕 요아스가 유다 왕 아마새에게 사람을 보내어

sentences.original_text: The thistle that was in Lebanon
sent to the cedar that was in Lebanon
Give thy daughter to my son to wife
sentences.korean_translation: 네 딸을 내 아들에게 아내로 주라

sentences.original_text: and there passed by a wild beast that was in Lebanon
